channel.title: Admin commands
channel.description: i need some admin commands to my private server please :D :D :) :(

item.title: Admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Jekkyl Dr Jekkyl
item.description:
@Dr_Jekkyl wrote:

what is it ? testscape? cos that already has loads of commands… mainly there is ::pickup just type that with the item ID after it and u pick up any item… what more could u want.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 27, 2006, 03:09:06 PM[/size][hr]though if u really are lazy here are a few item spawning commands:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“ownit”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addItem(1048,1);
addItem(6585,1);
addItem(6526,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(1052,1);
addItem(6889,1);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“rogue”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(5553,1);
addItem(5554,1);
addItem(5555,1);
addItem(5556,1);
addItem(5557,1);
addItem(6818,1);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“phats”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1039,10000);
addItem(1041,10000);
addItem(1043,10000);
addItem(1045,10000);
addItem(1047,10000);
addItem(1049,10000);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“rich”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(995,2000000000);

		}
		else if (command.startsWith("masks") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			addItem(1054,100000);
			addItem(1056,100000);
			addItem(1058,100000);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("drops") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			addItem(1050,1);
			addItem(1037,1);
			addItem(1419,1);
			addItem(1961,1);
			addItem(1959,1);
			addItem(962,1);
		}
		
		else if (command.startsWith("bluephat") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			addItem(1042,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("greenphat") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			addItem(1044,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("purplephat") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			addItem(1046,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("redphat") && playerRights >= 2)
		{
			addItem(1038,1);
		}[/code]

there not hard to make…
